markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Dragon Wings](/Spells.aspx?ID=2104)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=657" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 264 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=23)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Leathery wings sprout from your back, giving you a fly Speed of 60 feet or your Speed, whichever is faster. If you're still flying when this spell's duration would end, you float to the ground, with the effects of [_gentle landing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1542).

---
**Heightened (8th)** The duration increases to 10 minutes.
name: Dragon Wings

text: Dragon Wings Two Actions Source Player Core 2 pg. 264 1.1 Bloodline Draconic Duration 1 minute --- Leathery wings sprout from your back, giving you a fly Speed of 60 feet or your Speed, whichever is faster. If you're still flying when this spell's duration would end, you float to the ground, with the effects of gentle landing . --- Heightened (8th) The duration increases to 10 minutes.
